title: Van Aert, Vingegaard, Evenepoel Blast Radical New Montmartre Final of Tour de France
content:
'I expect chaos ... safety is being ignored': Peloton protests against a high-stress, high-stakes final while ASO chief defends hilly twist on Champs-Élysées procession.

Read the full article at Van Aert, Vingegaard, Evenepoel Blast Radical New Montmartre Final of Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
